item.summary: This is a test
Choose which level of menu/setting's to display. 'Expert'-level shows all items.
Setup how to control the channel changing.
If Teletext caching is enabled, displaying pages will be much faster.
12V output
Choose the order in which the tuner types will be used (for watching and recording).
Choose with tuner will be used first. If set to 'auto' the system will give priority to the tuner having the lowest number of channels/satellites.
When tuned to a service the system will normally scan the transponder for any changes and save them. Only set to 'yes' if you're absolutely sure what you're doing.
Allows more detailed to be in the crash log
Allows EIT data to be included in http streams.
Allows AIT to be included in http streams
This allows the ECM data to be included in the stream. This enables a client receiver to decode it.
This allows the receiver to decode the stream (if the ECM data is included in the stream and a valid card is available).
Show spinning logo when system is busy.
Choose whether or not to show an icon when a motorized dish is moving.
Services may be grouped in bouquets. If this option is enabled, you can use more then one bouquet.
Enable bouquet selection in Multi-EPG
With this option enabled, Channel numbers will start with '1' in each bouquet.
Services may be grouped in bouquets. If this option is enabled you can zap to a channel in another bouquet then you are in at present.
Use the alternative or the conventional radio mode.
Setup what a long press on the power button does.
Setup what a short press on the power button does.

item.text: Position of finished Timers in Timerlist
item.summary: This option allows you to control how finished timer are shown in the Timer List.
Set the time to hide the infobar.
This option allows you to set the type of the progress indication in the channel selection screen

item.text: Show channel numbers in channel selection
item.summary: This option enables channel numbers in the channel selection screen
If set to 'yes' the infobar will be displayed when changing channels.
If set to 'yes; the infobar will be displayed when Fast Forwarding or Rewinding during media playback.
If set to 'yes' the infobar will be displayed when a new event starts.
Set the screen type you get on pressing 'OK' when the info bar shows to 2nd infobar or event info.
Show background when tuned to a radio channel.
This option allows you to hide any zap error messages.
This option allows you to hide any Common Interface card error messages.
Show encryption info in the infobar (if the skin allows that).

item.text: Swap SNR in db with SNR in percentage on OSD
item.summary: This option allows you to the SNR as a percentage (not all receivers support this).
Allows the EIT now/next eventdata to be displayed in infobar.
Choose what you want the button '0' to do when PIP is active.
Allows the receiver to use the EIT EPG when tuned to a service. This data will be stored by the receiver.
Allows the receiver to use the MHW EPG when tuned to a service. This data will be stored by the receiver.
Allows the receiver to use the FreeSat EPG when tuned to a service. This data will be stored by the receiver.
Allows the receiver to use the ViaSat EPG when tuned to a service. This data will be stored by the receiver.
Allows the receiver to use the Netmed EPG when tuned to a service. This data will be stored by the receiver.
Allows epg data of a passed event to be displayed. Handy when you want to know something about an event that is about to finish or has just finished. (minutes):
Allows you to set the colour of the Teletext subtitles.
Allows you to use the original position of the Teletext subtitles.
Allows you to activate rewrapping of the teletext subtitles
Allows you to set the position of the Teletext subtitles.
Allows you to set the alignment of the Teletext subtitles.
Allows you to set the border width of the Teletext subtitles. This makes the titles more easy to read on a light background.
Allows you to set the font size of the Teletext subtitles.
Allows you to set the Teletext subtitle delay when timing lacks.
Allows you to use yellow DVB subtitles.
Allows you to set the position of the DVB subtitles.
Allows you to center the position of the DVB subtitles.
Allows you to set the transparency of the DVB subtitles.
Allows you to use Yellow pango DVB subtitles
Allows you to set audio language 1
Allows you to set audio language 2
Allows you to set audio language 3
Allows you to set audio language 4
If set to 'yes' the receiver will use AC3 sound (when available).

item.text: Prefer audio stream stored by service
item.summary: If set to 'yes' the receiver will use the audio stream that has been used earlier.
Allows you to set the subtitle language selection 1
Allows you to set the subtitle language selection 2
Allows you to set the subtitle language selection 3
Allows you to set the subtitle language selection 4
Allows displaying subtitle that equals the chosen audio.
Allows displaying the special hearing impaired subtitles
Allows you to prefer the special hearing impaired subtitles over normal subtitles.
Allows you to prefer the DVB-graphical subtitles over Teletext subtitles.
If set to 'yes' the receiver will use the subtitles that has been used earlier.
Allows you to set the EPG language selection 1
Allows you to set the EPG language selection 2

Behavior when a movie is stopped
Behavior when a movie reaches the end
Display message before next played movie
Limited character set for recording filenames
Keep old timers for how many days
Disk space to reserve for recordings (in GB)
